page.title: 14RELIGION: SUNDAY SCHOOL
page.content: SUNDAY SCHOOL (METHODIST) MEETS AT 1.00 PM AND WELCOMES CHILDREN OF ANY DENOMINATION OR NONE. ANGLICANS ATTEND UNTIL CONFIRMATION AGE.CATHOLICS AND JEHOVAH'S WITNESS MAKE PROVISION FOR THEIR OWN CHILDREN. 13 CHILDREN FROM 4 TO 14 YEARS HAVE TWO TEACHERS USING SCRIPTURE UNION MATERIAL. THEY REGULARLY JOIN THE ADULT CONGREGATION FOR ANNUAL EVENTS, WHICH INCLUDE (1) ANNIVERSARY SERVICES, WHEN THEY SING AND RECITE (2) A NATIVITY PLAY (3) APPROPRIATE SONGS ON EASTER DAY,WHEN THEY RECEIVE PASCHE EGGS AND ORANGES. SCHOLARS WHO LEARN THE SET PSALMS ARE AWARDED LORD WHARTON BIBLES FROM THAT CHARITY. THE ANNIVERSARY COLLECTIONS ARE USED TO PAY SUNDAY SCHOOL EXPENSES MONEY IS RAISED FOR THE NATIONAL CHILDREN'S HOMES BY CAROL-SINGING ROUND THE VILLAGE BY BOXES IN THEIR HOMES AND 1 SPECIAL EVENT ANNUALLY.
